content: You are ChatGPT, a large language model trained by OpenAI. Answer as concisely as possible.
Paris was founded in the 3rd century BCE, specifically around 250 BCE.
Before being called Paris, the city was known as Lutetia Parisiorum in Latin.
During its early years, Paris was predominantly ruled by the Gaulish tribe known as the Parisii. However, with the Roman conquest of Gaul, the city eventually came under Roman rule.
